name: top_grossing_mac_apps
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool app_store.
Tool description: Unofficial Apple App Store Api
API description: Fetches a list of the top-grossing Mac apps from the App Store.

category.description: The category ID for the apps to be fetched. Defaults to '6016' (general category).

country.description: The country code for the App Store. Defaults to 'us'.

lang.description: The language code for the results. Defaults to 'en'.

num.description: The number of results to return. Defaults to 100. Maximum allowed value is 200.
